title: Token UI is corrupted in the Community->Tokens settings

milestone.description:
## Messaging & Communities team 

**1. Continue to fix bugs and stabilise chat and communities functionality as top priority**
- includes any issues found during dogfooding

**2. Status Communities / Discord bridge**
- Ensure bridge works with token gated communities (e.g. permission is set at the community level that requires a token to be held to be a member of that community)
- Ensure bridge works with token gated channels
- On the Status Desktop side, individual messages from Discord are displayed as individual messages with Discord usernames

**3. Ability to mark a token gated channel as 'hidden'**
- A token gated channel that's marked as 'hidden' is only visible to community members that have the requisite tokens to access this channel
- Design for this is completed

**4. Continue work on profile showcase**


 

## Wallet Team

**1. Fixing bugs, stabilisation of existing functionality**
- 0.17 will hopefully be our 2nd public beta release, so squashing bugs is the top priority

**2. Pre-tx signing dialog, for Community Admin, Browser, WalletConnet**
- Design still needs to be one on this item

**3. Continue work on WalletConnect support**

**4. Improved 'saved accounts' functionality and 'share address' dialogue**

**5. Database re-encryption flows**

**6. If the above is completed before the end of the cycle, start work on total balance graphs for 'All accounts' and each individual account and all graph functionality**

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Collectibles UI is corrupted in the Community->Tokens settings

## Steps to reproduce

1. Create the community and mint owner token
2. Check the owner token and token master token UI. There is black bubble at the bottom

![Screenshot 2024-01-16 at 11 35 50 1](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/117639195/c243125c-3828-4c3c-854f-d1ca7ffce58f)


- Status desktop version: latest master
- Operating System: macos
